text: Ate phira'aina vali'am vicom ika saradha vala adami jisa ne apane imana nu luka'i'a ho'i'a si, ne akhi'a ki ki tusim loka sirafa isa gala la'i hati'a kara devoge ki uha kahida hai ki mera raba alaha hai. Halanki uha tuhade raba valom sapasata dalilam vi lai ke a'i'a ate jekara uha jhutha hai tam usa da jhutha use te digega. Ate jekara uha saca hai tam usa da ko'i asa tuhade taka pahuca ke rahega. Jisa da va'ada uha tuhade nala karada hai. Besaka alaha ajihe bade nu nasihata nahim bakhasada jihara simam di ulaghana karana vala hove ate jhutha hove
